title: Security options should be greyed out by default
author: igor2x
body_snippet: On mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3220: 1. File | Options. 2. Security and issues appears. "Completely encrypt encryption file" is too high. There should be some space between tab and this options. 3. Additionally options bellow like "Encryption Engine" etc are enabled even when first option "completely encrypt encryption file" is unchecked. I think all options should be greyed out.

comments.snippet: I guess for 1.78.X+ this specific issue can be ignored as the file storage and it's encryption are being completely reworked. Additionally, it should not be possible to store the files with credentials in plain text anyway...
